title: San Diego Homeowners Rip Up Their Lawns In Exchange For Rebates
teaser: The massive California drought means homeowners are coming to terms with the fact that water used on their lawns is water wasted. Many cities are offering rebates for people who take out their grass. But the conversion away from grass is still sometimes a tough sell.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
